nodes.text: Mephouts were sentients indigenous to Mephout. All Mephout politicians and diplomats were female due to the males being generally hot-headed and unable to control their tempers. The RST Model Translator Droid was designed by the Mephout to resemble them.
The Mephouts evolved on the planet Mephout, a planet located in the Mephout system in the Wild Space region. Their homeworld was explored sometime between 1000 BBY and 25 BBY.
